message:
My name is André Souza, I'm 23 years old, I'm from Espírito Santo. I'm studying Systems Analysis and Development and I've always dreamed of working in the area.




I have 5 years of experience with knowledge in: Docker, HTML, CSS&JS, React(Vite.JS, NextJS, CRA), React Native, PHP(Laravel) and NodeJS(ExpressJS, NestJs).LINUX, AWS, Digital Ocean, Git and Git Flow are also part of the knowledge acquired along the way.
